entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:52 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 12:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -13.4°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -19.5°C
Wind: NNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 11.
